subject: refactor: remove gh CLI dependency from extract-api.js, use curl + multi-token discovery
body:
extract-api.js now uses curl for GitHub API calls instead of gh CLI.
Token discovery checks GH_TOKEN, GITHUB_TOKEN, and GITHUB_ALL_REPO_TOKEN.
Tested and confirmed working. Eliminates the need to clone repos for extraction.

https://claude.ai/code/session_012JtBabbz3ZyR2fgYwfqzf3
title: remove gh CLI dependency from extract-api.js, use curl + multi-token discovery
